dict.acceptation: 队伍单行行进时拉长或产生间隔；侦察队两两散开；[建筑学] 嵌上，搭上；

sent.orig: A brush tail is a fault, as is also a partly or wholly hairless tail.
sent.trans: 刷子状的尾巴属于缺陷，整个无毛或部分无毛的尾巴也属于缺陷。

sent.orig: Including the horizontal stabilizer fin (horizontal tail) and the vertical fin (vertical tail) .
sent.trans: 尾翼包括水平尾翼（平尾）和垂直尾翼（垂尾）。

sent.orig: Before fixing, check the applicability between tail bolt hole and the pedestal tail bolt.
sent.trans: 安装前应检查地脚螺栓孔与底座螺栓孔是否相符。

sent.orig: A rat tail file; a rat tail comb.
